original_text: Then they were each given a white robe and told to rest a little longer, until the number of their fellow servants and their brothers should be complete, who were to be killed as they themselves had been.
korean_text: 각각 그들에게 흰 두루마기를 주시며 이르시되 아직 잠시 동안 쉬되 그들의 동무 종들과 형제들도 자기처럼 죽임을 당하여 그 수가 차기까지 하라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Then they were each given a white robe
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들 각자는 흰 옷을 받았고

sentences.original_text: and told to rest a little longer
until the number of their fellow servants
and their brothers should be complete
